thread.title_full: Massive snowstorm slams millions - Main Stream Videos

author: Whatfinger
title: Massive snowstorm slams millions - Main Stream Videos
text:
An arctic blast of air swept across the eastern part of the U.S., leaving a path of destruction from Wisconsin to Rhode Island.
